name: Magnetic Kredit Krab
description:
The rise of chaos agent themed games is here, become an incarnate of havoc as a magnetized crab who just wants to wrack up those purchases?

Living for so long in the grocery store, the crab has grown very large in size. 

He sees hundreds of thousands of customers make purchases, and longs to do so himself. When the moment of escape arises, he takes a card from a customer, and an object to purchase, but woe is the crab: his claws are magnetized! 

With the card inactive, he needs another form of currency... behold! A bank is in the store, and everyone has an account there, even with their credit cards ruined they can still get money. The crab must seize the opportunity... with giant claws of capitalism!

Ruin the cards, steal the cash, grab a product, and make the purchase! He will be the best customer ever, even if that security officer tries to stop him!
